input.sentences: the city spent a fortune on fireworks to celebrate its 200th birthday .
the display started well | but nothing unexpected .
near the end | it was a wonder how the fireworks exploded in the right way at the right time .
the grande finale left the audience in silent awe .
output.sentences: Our city spent a fortune on fireworks last year, so we couldn't wait to see what the display would be like this year.
we thought we were early, but the display started a half hour early and it was full throttle when we arrived.
The lights and noise were magnificent and the explosions of color in the sky grew bigger and bigger.
Over the course of more than an hour the fireworks exploded, sometimes alone, sometimes in groups.
The show was grand, every bit as good as last year, and we left very satisfied, after the last explosion, making our way home in the silence.
